page.title: 17TRELLECH SOCIETIES.
page.content: IN TRELLECH THERE ARE ABOUT SEVEN SOCIETIES. ON IS THE MOTHERS' UNION. THEY MEET ONCE A MONTH IN THE CHURCH HALL. IT MEETS AT 2.30PM AND IT WAS FORMED FOR THE LADIES OF THE CHURCH TO MEET. TRELLECH VILLAGE PRODUCE ASSOC. MEETS MONTHLY TO LISTEN TO TALKS ON GARDENING, AT 7.30 IN THE VILLAGE HALL. THE FRIENDS OF TRELLECH MEET AS A HISTORICAL SOCIETY, AND THEY ARE INTERESTED IN PROMOTING HISTORY TALKS, RECITALS, AND A MUSIC FESTIVAL ONCE A YEAR. THE WOMENS INSTITUTE HAS 19 MEMBERS. IT IS FOR COUNTRY WOMEN TO KNOW ABOUT COUNTRY LIFE.THE VILLAGE PLAYING-FIELDS ASSOC. WAS FORMED TO LOOK AFTER THE SEE-SAW AND SWINGS, SLIDE AND ROUNDABOUT.IF THEY BREAK, THEY CAN PAY THE COST OF THE REPAIRS.V
